credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
dimensions:
H x W: 59 x 13 cm (23 1/4 x 5 1/8 in.)
Repeat H: 24.1 cm (9 1/2 in.)
title: Band
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace (The tabs were worked on a 4-element braid. The 2 and 3/8 square grid of the band was created by two 4-element flat braids along the length connected by cords covered with figure-8 interlacing.)
description: Border of square compartments with a narrow serpentine band running through the entire length. Piece edged by pendants. Modes: portes, brides.
name: Band
